main event: A sighting of a bright ball of light was reported by crew members around 2:53 A.M. on April 23, 1957, in Guam.
interesting points: The object appeared bright enough to illuminate the cockpit., The light changed from a ball to three separate glowing fragments., The sighting lasted approximately 12 seconds., The crew initially thought the light was from an interceptor aircraft., The report mentions a phosphorous flare and its comparison to conventional aircraft behavior.
sighted object: a bright ball of light and glowing fragments
witness description: crew member of a military flight
